title: Specification of Complex Analytics Workflows: A Formal Language Model of Decision Options
details: P Miri¹, P Kochovski¹, MT de Oliveira - Economics of Grids, Clouds, Systems, and Services …
abstract: The specification of experiments expressed as Complex Analytics Workflows is a complex task that involves many decision-making steps with various degrees of complexity. The use of the context, the expert knowledge, and the potential for its …
